text: This article lists events from the year 2003 in The Bahamas. == Incumbents == * Monarch: Elizabeth II * Governor-General: Dame Ivy Dumont * Prime Minister: Perry Christie ==Events== ===September=== * September 3 -Tropical Storm Henri hits the Bahamas ==Deaths== ==See also== List of years in the Bahamas ==References== ==Links== Category:2000s in the Bahamas Category:Years of the 21st century in the Bahamas Bahamas Bahamas
title: 2003 in the Bahamas
